pages.text: $(o)Ah, the bee, always humming around, happily unaware of a world much more complex than just making honey in their hive... $(br2)$()If it pays attention, a witch will find such hives hanging from trees.

Those not wise enough to follow the Art say that simply punching it will be enough to obtain honeycombs.$(br2)Of course, you, a dignified witch, would never do such thing, relying instead on your trusty $(l:tools/boline)boline$() to do the harvesting. $(br2)You might get stung as those
brutes, but at least you will have a garanteed honey comb drop...$(br2)$(p)$(o)Bee puns really sting...
